OK, where to get that and how to install it on linux?

Eclipse 3.1 is available from eclipse.org/downloads.  Installing Eclipse just
involves untarring/zipping it.  For further instructions on running, see the
readme included in the release (eclipse/readme/readme_eclipse.html).
